description: Enable seamless interaction with GitHub repositories, issues, pull requests, and user data through a unified interface. Manage repository content, search code and users, and handle issues and pull requests efficiently. Streamline your GitHub workflows by integrating these capabilities directly into your applications.

capabilities.name: search_repositories
capabilities.description: Search for GitHub repositories. Returns a concise list with essential information. Use 'get_repository' for detailed information about a specific repository.

capabilities.name: search_code
capabilities.description: Search for code across GitHub repositories. Returns a concise list with file paths and repositories. Use 'get_file_contents' for full file content.

capabilities.name: search_users
capabilities.description: Search for GitHub users.

capabilities.name: get_issue
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific issue in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: add_issue_comment
capabilities.description: Add a comment to a specific issue in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: search_issues
capabilities.description: Search for issues in GitHub repositories.

capabilities.name: create_issue
capabilities.description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: list_issues
capabilities.description: List issues in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: update_issue
capabilities.description: Update an existing issue in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: get_issue_comments
capabilities.description: Get comments for a specific issue in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: get_repository
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a GitHub repository including README and file structure

capabilities.name: get_commit
capabilities.description: Get details for a commit from a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: list_commits
capabilities.description: Get list of commits of a branch in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: list_branches
capabilities.description: List branches in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: create_or_update_file
capabilities.description: Create or update a single file in a GitHub repository. If updating an existing file, you must provide the current SHA of the file (the full 40-character SHA, not a shortened version).

capabilities.name: create_repository
capabilities.description: Create a new GitHub repository in your account

capabilities.name: get_file_contents
capabilities.description: Get the contents of a file from a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: fork_repository
capabilities.description: Fork a GitHub repository to your account or specified organization

capabilities.name: create_branch
capabilities.description: Create a new branch in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: list_tags
capabilities.description: List git tags in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: get_tag
capabilities.description: Get details about a specific git tag in a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: push_files
capabilities.description: Push multiple files to a GitHub repository in a single commit

capabilities.name: get_pull_request
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific pull request in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: update_pull_request
capabilities.description: Update an existing pull request in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: list_pull_requests
capabilities.description: List pull requests in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: merge_pull_request
capabilities.description: Merge a pull request in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: get_pull_request_files
capabilities.description: Get the files changed in a specific pull request.

capabilities.name: get_pull_request_status
capabilities.description: Get the status of a specific pull request.

capabilities.name: update_pull_request_branch
capabilities.description: Update the branch of a pull request with the latest changes from the base branch (not implemented)

capabilities.name: get_pull_request_comments
capabilities.description: Get comments for a specific pull request

capabilities.name: create_pull_request
capabilities.description: Create a new pull request in a GitHub repository.

capabilities.name: get_pull_request_review_comments
capabilities.description: Get review comments (line-by-line code comments) for a specific pull request.

capabilities.name: create_pull_request_review_comment
capabilities.description: Create a review comment (line-by-line code comment) on a pull request.
